/usr/bin/c++    -g -O3 -std=c++11     CMakeFiles/kfusion-benchmark-cuda.dir/src/benchmark.cpp.o CMakeFiles/kfusion-benchmark-cuda.dir/src/PowerMonitor.cpp.o  -o kfusion-benchmark-cuda -rdynamic libkfusion-cuda.a -lrt -lstdc++ -lpthread /usr/local/cuda-7.0/lib64/libcudart.so -lrt -lstdc++ -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda-7.0/lib64
